title: SEMA 2015
description: Fresh back from SEMA Jonathon Klein (@jonathon_klein) and I give the guys our take on the 2015 show, Matt gives us his take on the new Miata, Jeff Glucker leaves us with his impressions of the 2016 Camaro SS and Matt buys a Skyline.  Additionally we cover recumbant bicycles, the Yamaha concept, bolt on flares, a quick take on the Huracan and leasing rims.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
